name: reference-data-management
description: Reference Data Management System using GOV.UK Frontend

scripts.build: mkdir -p public/stylesheets public/scripts public/assets && cp -R node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets public/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.css public/stylesheets/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.css.map public/stylesheets/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.js public/scripts/
